properties.entry: UPDATE im_strain_type ty, im_strain_attributes att SET ty.attribute = att.id, ty.active = :status, ty.version = ty.version + 1, ty.updated_at = now() WHERE ty.location_id = :restaurantId AND ty.name = :prevStrain AND att.name = :attribute;
UPDATE im_strain_attributes SET name = :attribute, active = :status WHERE location_id = :restaurantId AND name = :prevAttribute;
INSERT INTO `im_cash_drop` (terminal, cashregister_id, cash_drop, user_id, datetime, location_id) VALUES (:terminal, :cashRegisterId, :cashCount, :userId, now(), :restaurantId);
update DL_EXAMPLE set name = :name where id = :id;
